Reviews.Title: Great basic flip phone.
Reviews.Author: Joseph S. "Joe"
Reviews.Content: If you want a simple flip phone without the bells and whistles of the more common phones that have internet, ect. than this if for you. It has great simple features. It has an extra loud ringer setting and an option for a simultanious ringer/vibration setting which I like best. On other flip phones, it's either or. Great price too. I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: RS
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my mother. It's suitable for her because of the big keys and numbers. It's easy to use. It has a lot of features but she isn't really that technology savvy so answering and making calls is all that she needs it for.  I've always liked products by Nokia.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Easy
Reviews.Author: too late
Reviews.Content: Product arrived fast. Item is a gift for an older women and she is quite happy.  Simple phone for those not wanting complicated phones.  Also a rare find to find a flip which doesn't allow for accidental dialing.

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: Caroline Levine
Reviews.Content: I ordered this flip phone for my husband because of its size (large) in the design it is larger than most flip phones out there. Also he can check the date and time by  opening and closing the phone.

Reviews.Title: Simple but Great
Reviews.Author: BethShelby
Reviews.Content: I like a phone that is perfect for the basic user.  I like the time that show up when it is closed.  My only problem is the battery doesn't stay charged very long and the volumn isn't quite as loud as I would like.

Reviews.Title: Calls are usually unclear.
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: It is ok but not as good as my 7 yr old Nokia that started to fall apart.  The calls are not clear.  I am considering duck taping my old phone together.  I don't care what they look like.

Reviews.Title: Not what was needed.
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: The phone does not have a vibrate function and had a hard time keeping signal. It was good for listening to music though.

Reviews.Title: Maybe unlocked - but not work
Reviews.Author: B. Banker
Reviews.Content: I got to use with Roshan in Afghanistan; but it won't work.  So maybe unlocked; but only works in America. I'm out $60 and can't even return due to Li battery.  Total loss.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: DulfiM
Reviews.Content: I was just looking for a nice phone for my aunt. She is more than 60 and she can barely see the screen of most cell phones. Thank God she loved this one... all she needs to do is read the sms, answer and make phone calls... ohhhh she also wanted to listen to music on it. This cell phone is pretty easy to use for her... numbers on screen are quite big, and she can listen to the radio on it... the camera is ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 2720 fold phone
Reviews.Author: luci
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, light, good shape to carry on the pocket. Good quality for the price.Negative: to conserve battery the phone shuts off the display until you open it, which means that you can't see the hour or if you have a missed call or a message.Overall, I am satisfied

Reviews.Title: Nice and sleek little phone...
Reviews.Author: Overseas Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone about a month ago as a gift for my husband. Delivery time was great, no problems there. When it comes to mobile phones Nokia always strikes me as being one of the most durable at a reasonable price, hence the reason my attention went straight for the Nokia phone because any mobile phone owned by my husband really needs to stand the test of durability as he doesn't take much care in protecting it.  This phone actually looks nicer in real than online. It's unlocked, and I'm outside the US, and it was quite easy, I just slip in the sim and it worked perfectly with the local network. I haven't checked out thoroughly the quality of pics as yet, but my only disappointment so far is that I didn't get a USB cable with it.  So if you're looking for a nice, sleek looking phone on a budget, this is it...

Reviews.Title: !IMPORTANT! Read this before buying.
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: -Black,blue and grey cellphone-Blue display.-Mirror and matt finish.-At&t; logo.-Generic battery lid,is grey with matt finish.-Generic battery  [one hour...never finish to load]-Unlocked? [this cellphone don't give me access i only can look the battery load.]I buy a new Nokia cellphone and they send me a UGLY Refurbished cellphone.PD:"eComElectronics's inventory is constantly changing, they can't replace items"They send what they want :( Other store for my black list.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stoosh
Reviews.Content: I received this item on time and it was as pictured and perfect for my grandma. The only problem I have is that it says it was an unlocked phone but I didn't not receive the unlock code. I will try to take it somewhere else to try to unlock it. The missing unlock code is the only problem I have with this phone.

Reviews.Title: It wasn't really unlocked
Reviews.Author: Roizak
Reviews.Content: Every thing is OK besides the fact that it wasn't unlocked and I can't use it... The information was misleading.

Reviews.Title: one problem
Reviews.Author: pitu
Reviews.Content: It is a good product I had one before I love it,  that is why I bougth againg, but this one I got,  came break, I have to take to the service to repair, because had trouble the microphone, it is not audible,  I can not hear the person who is speaking and the problem is I live in other country .... I got it while I went to U.S.A

Reviews.Title: Not Good For Elderly Person With...
Reviews.Author: trekker gal
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my elderly mother.Pro-screen is good sizefairly easy to use if you do not have eyesight issuesswitch out mini sim card for easy set up.ConsMenu button is not easy to use. Other phones have easy to read arrows for menu navigation. This one does not. You have to press the side of the button in the direction you want to move in. If they had arrow or directional  buttons it would definitely be easier for someone with nimble fingers or poor eyesight.Our phone must have been refurbished or used  because the voice mail was registered to someone else. very strange since I thought voicemail set up was determined by your sim card/service provider.

Reviews.Title: Works well, but may have been used despite sold as new
Reviews.Author: Mademoiselle
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my mom and although it has been going strong since I bought it, I believe it was used since we have had some problems with utilizing it.

Reviews.Title: NEED TO BE RETURNED
Reviews.Author: Galin Y Stoykov
Reviews.Content: I checked in with T-Mobile to make sure the problem is not the Sim Card. We put a new one, problem was not solved. Then, we made sure the phone is unlocked. However, T-Mobile was not able to help solving this problem with the connection/reception.I am not able to use this phone in the United States due to lock of connectivity. T-Mobile advised me the phone must have a different  frequence most likely for Europe or Asia. I am not happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: snearpass
Reviews.Content: This is the only phone that I know how to use and my old one broke. Thank you for your help.

Reviews.Title: Its not unlocked...
Reviews.Author: ashwin anumakonda
Reviews.Content: Phone is good.. but its not unlocked!i was out of country and could not use it.... when they say unlock they should give a unlock one...

Reviews.Title: Talk Power Tower
Reviews.Author: Lilly in FLA
Reviews.Content: Wanted a TALK phone and Nokia has the Power for Towers.User friendly,individual keys. Only drawback...ringer is not loud enough because I work outside on a boat.

Reviews.Title: Great flip Phone
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband, he wanted a flip phone.  There are not many to choose from, this Nokia turned out to be a very nice phone gets great service and is easy to set up.Was worried about buying from a company other than T-Mobile but I have to say the phone was new and came boxed with a charger.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Charles Ly
Reviews.Content: very simple phone to use. I bought this phone for my mom because she is getting to the older side of the age. She needed a keypad that was easy to look at, and for phone use only...no texting etc. She likes it! Cant complain yet.

Reviews.Title: Sent me one for Verizon and I have T-mobile
Reviews.Author: Chalyce
Reviews.Content: The quality of the phone was fine, I assume.  Couldn't use it because they didn't send me the right one.  Oh well, it was time to join the smartphone generation anyway.

Reviews.Title: nikia 2720
Reviews.Author: JOSE IZQUIEL/R. J. DIAZ "telef corporativo, malo"
Reviews.Content: Nokia is a very easy to handle, the soft keyboard is not complicated. has dictionary which facilitates the insertion of words

Reviews.Title: Good simple mobile, BUT NOT UNLOCKED !!!
Reviews.Author: Giulio "euro"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice mobile device. Easy to to use and designed for humans who fancy talking and few SMS's... It's NOT unlocked. It works only for GSM carriers in the rubbish USA. I've tried it in the UK and in Greece and it has not signal whatsoever. Do not buy if you plan on using it outside of the rubbish states. Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work in Costa Rica
Reviews.Author: axery
Reviews.Content: The phone was fine, and Amazon service as always was great... but it did not work in my country :(, my mistake...Actually I am rating this as 5 due to Amazon reliability, excellent prices, great customer service and schedule adherence. Amazon ROCKS!!!

Reviews.Title: Blue??
Reviews.Author: Robyn Gervais
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS PHONE AS A GIFT FOR MY MOTHER. I ORDERED IT IN BLACK AND RECEIVED A BLUE PHONE. THIS IS MY ONLY COMPLAINT AS MY MOTHER LOVES A NOKIA FLIP.
